Translations.Text: Eben se vi turn them vi pursue mercy de your Lord vi trakt them nicest manier
Vi ne keep your man stingily lig your kol nor shall vi foolishly open gxi up lest vi end blamed kaj sorry
your Lord increases provision anyone Li chooses redukt gxi. Li est fully Cognizant de His creatures Seer
Vi ne kill your infan due al tim de poverty! Ni proviz por them tro vi. Killing them est gross offense
Vi shall commit adultery; gxi est gross pek evil behavior
Vi ne kill any ul - Por DI far life sankt! - Escept justice Unu killed unjustly tiam ni don his heir auxtoritat enforce justice Tiel li ne exceed lim vengx murd; li help
Vi ne tusx orf mon escept por their own bon gxis ili reach maturity. Vi fulfill your covenants covenant est great responsibility
Vi don plen mezur when vi meti pes equitably! This est put kaj righteous
Vi ne akcept any information vi verify gxi yourself. Mi don vi auxd eyesight cerb vi est responsible por uz them
Vi ne marsx proudly ter - Vi ne ted ter nor can vi est as tall as mont
All mav behavior kondamn your Lord
